bio: She resembles Reversa, but her reversed pattern is a rare sight. Her depression—not so rare.

soultimate.name: Zany Zone
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Heals allies at a rate of 15% every 2 seconds for 30 seconds.
soultimate.description: All nearby allies slowly recover HP.

skill.effect: Attack up by 20% when HP is full.
skill.name: Mood Swing

name: Reversette
